parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Assign a unit as gunner of a vehicle. Used together with [[orderGetIn]] to order subordinate units to get in as gunner of a specific vehicle. Before usage of this command a subordinate unit has not got the option to get into the gunner place of the vehicle.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''assignAsGunner''' vehicleName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_soldier1 assignAsGunner _tank
[_soldier1] orderGetIn true</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[assignAsCargoIndex]], [[moveInCargo]], [[moveInCommander]], [[moveInDriver]], [[moveInGunner]], [[moveInTurret]], [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[assignedVehicle]], [[unassignVehicle]], [[leaveVehicle]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|ASSIGNASGUNNER]]
